firstrune.title: Lethal Tempo
firstrune.desc: 1.5s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of attack speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

secondrune.title: Triumph
secondrune.desc: Takedowns restore 15% of your missing health and grant an additional 25 gold.

thirdrune.title: Legend: Alacrity
thirdrune.desc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.

forthrune.title: Coup de Grace
forthrune.desc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

nextpagerunafirst.title: Conditioning
nextpagerunafirst.desc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

nextpagerunesecond.title: Overgrowth
nextpagerunesecond.desc: Gain additional permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

firstrune.title: Summon Aery
firstrune.desc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.

secondrune.title: The Ultimate Hat
secondrune.desc: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced. Each time you cast your ultimate, its cooldown is further reduced.

thirdrune.title: Celerity
thirdrune.desc: Gain 4% extra MS. Gain extra AP or AD, adaptive based on your bonus MS.

forthrune.title: Scorch
forthrune.desc: Your first ability hit every 20s burns champions.

nextpagerunafirst.title: Sudden Impact
nextpagerunafirst.desc: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 10 Lethality and 8 Magic Penetration for 5s.

nextpagerunesecond.title: Zombie Ward
nextpagerunesecond.desc: After killing a ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place. When your wards expire, they also reanimate as Zombie Wards.

firstrune.title: Electrocute
firstrune.desc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

secondrune.title: Sudden Impact
secondrune.desc: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 10 Lethality and 8 Magic Penetration for 5s.

thirdrune.title: Zombie Ward
thirdrune.desc: After killing a ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place. When your wards expire, they also reanimate as Zombie Wards.

forthrune.title: Ravenous Hunter
forthrune.desc: Unique takedowns grant permanent healing from ability damage.

nextpagerunafirst.title: Perfect Timing
nextpagerunafirst.desc: Gain a free Stopwatch. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis effect.

nextpagerunesecond.title: Magical Footwear
nextpagerunesecond.desc: You get free boots at 10 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each takedown you get makes your boots come 30s sooner.

firstrune.title: Guardian
firstrune.desc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage, you're both hasted and granted a shield.

secondrune.title: Font of Life
secondrune.desc: Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.

thirdrune.title: Conditioning
thirdrune.desc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

forthrune.title: Overgrowth
forthrune.desc: Gain additional permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

nextpagerunafirst.title: Nullifying Orb
nextpagerunafirst.desc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.

nextpagerunesecond.title: Transcendence
nextpagerunesecond.desc: Gain 10% CDR when you reach level 10. Excess CDR becomes AP or AD, adaptive.

firstrune.title: Aftershock
firstrune.desc: After immobilizing an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of adaptive damage around you.

secondrune.title: Demolish
secondrune.desc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.

thirdrune.title: Conditioning
thirdrune.desc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

forthrune.title: Overgrowth
forthrune.desc: Gain additional permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

nextpagerunafirst.title: The Ultimate Hat
nextpagerunafirst.desc: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced. Each time you cast your ultimate, its cooldown is further reduced.

nextpagerunesecond.title: Transcendence
nextpagerunesecond.desc: Gain 10% CDR when you reach level 10. Excess CDR becomes AP or AD, adaptive.

firstrune.title: Arcane Comet
firstrune.desc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

secondrune.title: Manaflow Band
secondrune.desc: Periodically your next ability used has its mana or energy cost refunded and restores some of your missing mana or energy.

thirdrune.title: Celerity
thirdrune.desc: Gain 4% extra MS. Gain extra AP or AD, adaptive based on your bonus MS.

forthrune.title: Scorch
forthrune.desc: Your first ability hit every 20s burns champions.

nextpagerunafirst.title: Eyeball Collection
nextpagerunafirst.desc: Collect eyeballs for champion and ward takedowns. Gain permanent AD or AP, adaptive for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.

nextpagerunesecond.title: Cheap Shot
nextpagerunesecond.desc: Deal bonus true damage to enemies with impaired movement or actions.

firstrune.title: Arcane Comet
firstrune.desc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

secondrune.title: The Ultimate Hat
secondrune.desc: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced. Each time you cast your ultimate, its cooldown is further reduced.

thirdrune.title: Absolute Focus
thirdrune.desc: While above 70% health, gain extra adaptive damage.

forthrune.title: Gathering Storm
forthrune.desc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, adaptive over the course of the game.

nextpagerunafirst.title: Eyeball Collection
nextpagerunafirst.desc: Collect eyeballs for champion and ward takedowns. Gain permanent AD or AP, adaptive for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.

nextpagerunesecond.desc: Deal bonus true damage to enemies with impaired movement or actions.

firstrune.title: Fleet Footwork
firstrune.desc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased MS.

secondrune.desc: Takedowns restore 15% of your missing health and grant an additional 25 gold.

nextpagerunesecond.title: Gathering Storm
nextpagerunesecond.desc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, adaptive over the course of the game.

firstrune.title: Glacial Augment
firstrune.desc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.

secondrune.title: Perfect Timing
secondrune.desc: Gain a free Stopwatch. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis effect.

thirdrune.title: Magical Footwear
thirdrune.desc: You get free boots at 10 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each takedown you get makes your boots come 30s sooner.

forthrune.title: Cosmic Insight
forthrune.desc: +5% CDR +5% Max CDR +5% Summoner Spell CDR +5% Item CDR.

nextpagerunafirst.title: Celerity
nextpagerunafirst.desc: Gain 4% extra MS. Gain extra AP or AD, adaptive based on your bonus MS.

nextpagerunesecond.title: Waterwalking
nextpagerunesecond.desc: Gain MS and AP or AD, adaptive in the river.

nextpagerunesecond.desc: +100 Health permanently -10% damage to champions and monsters until 10min.

firstrune.desc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

secondrune.title: Unflinching
secondrune.desc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for a shot duration. Additionally, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.
